Package it.seba.juno.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.seba.juno.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controls both the GameView and the GameModel of the program, it assigns actions to the GameView components.
Author:
Sebastian Rapetti

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameModel gameModel, PlayersModel playersModel, MainView mainView, MenuView menuView, GameView gameView)
      Class Constructor.
      Parameters:
      gameModel - The option model, the match between players.
      playersModel - The player model, contains the data about players.
      mainView - The main view, used to host all others view.
      menuView - The menu view, show the main menu.
      gameView - The game view, show Uno game.

      Action for the player move, recursive method, recursive call is timed and recursion stop when the player is a human player.

      Parameters:
      e - The component triggered the event/the event.
      color - The new color for the discard pile.
